alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:05PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rockingham and south central Strafford Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 605 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Raymond, or 9 miles northeast of Derry, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Derry, Exeter, Salem, Epping, Brentwood, Raymond, Newmarket, Hampstead, Atkinson, Kingston, Auburn, Chester, Danville, Lee, Fremont, Deerfield, Candia, East Kingston, Kensington and Nottingham. This includes Interstate 93 between mile markers 3 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
